text: "What a Fool Believes" is 1979 song by The Doobie Brothers. It was taken from their eighth studio album Minute by Minute. It went to number 1 in the United States and Canada, number 31 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Australia, number 10 in the Netherlands and number 5 in New Zealand. It won 2 Grammy Awards in 1980. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:The Doobie Brothers songs Category:Kenny Loggins songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:George Michael songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: What a Fool Believes
